dcterms:description: The CARLA dataset is used to simulate different viewpoints for training and testing BEV segmentation models, allowing for isolated analysis of the impact of viewpoint changes.
dcterms:title: CARLA Dataset

dcterms:description: NVIDIA DRIVE Sim is utilized for evaluating models trained on real data, providing a photorealistic test set from diverse camera viewpoints.
dcterms:title: NVIDIA DRIVE Sim

dcterms:creator: Holger Caesar

dcterms:description: The nuScenes dataset provides camera parameters used for rendering datasets in CARLA, allowing for the simulation of different camera viewpoints.
dcterms:title: nuScenes Dataset
